analyst_persona.domain_focus: Channel Management, Customer Management, Interaction Management, Partner Management

key_business_process_changes: Automated post-interaction survey triggers across all channels
Integration of customer satisfaction metrics into operational decision-making
Real-time feedback loops for continuous service improvement
Partner and merchant relationship management enhancement

kpi_framework_basis.nps_impact: Net Promoter Score - customer loyalty and satisfaction
kpi_framework_basis.csat_impact: Customer Satisfaction Score - immediate satisfaction measurement

priority_levels.CRITICAL: Direct impact on primary KPIs, high customer visibility, competitive advantage
priority_levels.HIGH: Strong KPI alignment, significant customer impact, operational improvement
priority_levels.MEDIUM: Moderate KPI support, operational efficiency gains, quality enhancement
priority_levels.LOW: Minimal KPI impact, internal process improvement, future foundation

detailed_requirements_with_priorities.description: Integration of survey triggers into voice platform configuration
detailed_requirements_with_priorities.business_process_change: Voice services will automatically trigger customer satisfaction surveys post-interaction

kpi_alignment.priority_rationale: Direct CSAT measurement capability enables immediate relationship development and NPS improvement through voice channel satisfaction tracking

detailed_requirements_with_priorities.description: Voice channel availability monitoring with survey integration
detailed_requirements_with_priorities.business_process_change: System availability metrics will trigger automated service quality surveys

kpi_alignment.priority_rationale: Channel availability directly impacts customer experience and enables proactive service quality management

detailed_requirements_with_priorities.description: Post-call survey automation for all voice interactions
detailed_requirements_with_priorities.business_process_change: Every call resolution will trigger contextual survey delivery

kpi_alignment.priority_rationale: Universal post-call feedback enables immediate CSAT measurement and NPS improvement through comprehensive voice interaction tracking

detailed_requirements_with_priorities.business_process_change: Incident resolution processes will include mandatory feedback collection

kpi_alignment.priority_rationale: Incident resolution effectiveness measurement improves CSAT and reduces cost-to-serve through better problem resolution

detailed_requirements_with_priorities.business_process_change: All branch transactions will trigger post-visit experience surveys

kpi_alignment.priority_rationale: Branch experience directly impacts NPS and CSAT as primary customer touchpoint, critical for relationship development

detailed_requirements_with_priorities.business_process_change: Staff allocation decisions will be informed by customer feedback data

kpi_alignment.priority_rationale: Staff optimization improves cost-to-serve efficiency and customer satisfaction through better resource allocation

detailed_requirements_with_priorities.description: Branch performance analytics with customer feedback integration
detailed_requirements_with_priorities.business_process_change: Branch network optimization will incorporate customer satisfaction metrics

kpi_alignment.priority_rationale: Network optimization based on satisfaction data improves cost-to-serve and CSAT through strategic branch placement

detailed_requirements_with_priorities.business_process_change: Product optimization decisions will be driven by branch-specific feedback

kpi_alignment.priority_rationale: Product placement optimization improves CSAT and operational efficiency through data-driven decisions

detailed_requirements_with_priorities.description: Behavioral pattern analysis with survey correlation
detailed_requirements_with_priorities.business_process_change: Fraud detection algorithms will incorporate customer satisfaction anomalies

kpi_alignment.priority_rationale: Enhanced fraud detection reduces cost-to-serve and prevents customer satisfaction issues from security breaches

detailed_requirements_with_priorities.business_process_change: System errors will trigger immediate customer impact surveys

kpi_alignment.priority_rationale: Error impact measurement supports channel availability monitoring but has limited direct KPI impact

detailed_requirements_with_priorities.business_process_change: Channel performance evaluation will be based on integrated customer feedback

kpi_alignment.priority_rationale: Multi-channel experience measurement is foundational for all KPIs - directly impacts CSAT, NPS, and enables cost optimization

detailed_requirements_with_priorities.business_process_change: Channel coverage decisions will incorporate satisfaction and effort scores

kpi_alignment.priority_rationale: Coverage optimization balances cost-to-serve with customer satisfaction, enabling strategic channel investment

detailed_requirements_with_priorities.business_process_change: All digital interactions will include contextual micro-surveys

kpi_alignment.priority_rationale: Digital journey optimization directly impacts CSAT and NPS as primary modern customer touchpoint

detailed_requirements_with_priorities.business_process_change: New customer onboarding will include progressive satisfaction measurement

kpi_alignment.priority_rationale: Onboarding experience is critical for NPS and early CSAT, setting foundation for customer relationship

detailed_requirements_with_priorities.business_process_change: Help system usage will automatically trigger effectiveness surveys

kpi_alignment.priority_rationale: Help effectiveness directly improves CSAT and reduces cost-to-serve through better self-service capabilities

detailed_requirements_with_priorities.business_process_change: System usability improvements will be driven by continuous feedback collection

kpi_alignment.priority_rationale: Usability improvements support CSAT and cost reduction through better user experience design

detailed_requirements_with_priorities.business_process_change: Access provisioning will include experience validation surveys

kpi_alignment.priority_rationale: Access experience measurement improves CSAT but has limited broader KPI impact

detailed_requirements_with_priorities.business_process_change: Credit assessment processes will include customer experience measurement

kpi_alignment.priority_rationale: Credit process feedback has minimal direct impact on primary KPIs, limited to process improvement

detailed_requirements_with_priorities.business_process_change: All relationship management activities will incorporate continuous feedback loops

kpi_alignment.priority_rationale: Relationship management is core to NPS and CSAT improvement, fundamental to customer satisfaction strategy

detailed_requirements_with_priorities.business_process_change: Advisory interactions will include immediate satisfaction and effectiveness surveys

kpi_alignment.priority_rationale: Advisory service quality directly drives NPS and CSAT through personalized customer interaction

detailed_requirements_with_priorities.business_process_change: Problem resolution workflows will mandate follow-up satisfaction surveys

kpi_alignment.priority_rationale: Problem resolution effectiveness is critical for CSAT recovery and NPS improvement after service failures

detailed_requirements_with_priorities.business_process_change: Every customer interaction will include real-time quality assessment

kpi_alignment.priority_rationale: Real-time interaction quality assessment enables immediate CSAT improvement and NPS optimization

detailed_requirements_with_priorities.business_process_change: Customer contact strategies will be optimized based on satisfaction feedback

kpi_alignment.priority_rationale: Contact optimization improves CSAT efficiency and reduces cost-to-serve through better targeting

detailed_requirements_with_priorities.business_process_change: Customer sessions will include micro-feedback for dialogue effectiveness

kpi_alignment.priority_rationale: Session optimization improves CSAT through better dialogue management but has moderate overall impact

detailed_requirements_with_priorities.business_process_change: Action initiation workflows will validate customer satisfaction

kpi_alignment.priority_rationale: Action completion tracking provides limited KPI improvement beyond basic satisfaction measurement

detailed_requirements_with_priorities.business_process_change: Alliance management will include systematic partner satisfaction surveys

kpi_alignment.priority_rationale: Partner satisfaction impacts cost-to-serve through better alliance management but has indirect customer impact

detailed_requirements_with_priorities.business_process_change: Partner communication processes will incorporate feedback mechanisms

kpi_alignment.priority_rationale: Information sharing optimization has minimal direct impact on primary customer-facing KPIs

detailed_requirements_with_priorities.business_process_change: Merchant onboarding and service delivery will include systematic feedback collection

kpi_alignment.priority_rationale: Merchant experience directly impacts our service quality reputation and operational efficiency in payments ecosystem

detailed_requirements_with_priorities.business_process_change: Merchant service processes will integrate continuous satisfaction monitoring

kpi_alignment.priority_rationale: Merchant service quality measurement supports operational efficiency and service reputation

detailed_requirements_with_priorities.business_process_change: Bank-to-bank operations will include relationship satisfaction measurement

kpi_alignment.priority_rationale: Correspondent bank feedback has limited direct impact on customer-facing KPIs, primarily internal operational improvement

stakeholder_strategic_insights.nps_improvement_focus: 8 CRITICAL requirements directly enable NPS improvement through comprehensive customer touchpoint feedback
stakeholder_strategic_insights.csat_optimization_priority: 15 HIGH/CRITICAL requirements focus on immediate satisfaction measurement and improvement
stakeholder_strategic_insights.cost_efficiency_balance: 7 requirements strategically balance cost-to-serve optimization with service quality enhancement
stakeholder_strategic_insights.channel_excellence_foundation: Multi-channel experience measurement (CRITICAL) provides foundational capability for all KPI improvements

analyst_validation: Complete hierarchical requirements mapping with stakeholder priority assessment based on Performance Framework KPIs alignment
